name: bigger-artillery-balanced
title: Bigger Artillery (Balanced)
author: tntmasta
description: Vanilla-like adjustments to the bigger artillery mod. x2 range and stack size of 1 instead of x12.5 range and 20-50 stack size. Also changed the research cost from 2k to 4k and inventory stack size to 2. Credit to Mrxmen24 for the original.
